about.en: I love designing and implementing algorithms that descend gradients to solve a challenging set of problems. As an Information Technology undergraduate at the IIIT, Allahabad, I spend most of my time learning how to do cool things with computers. In my freetime you can find me taking down the next video-game boss, enjoying an epic fantasy book, or trying to dribble past a defender in football/soccer. Here's a link to my full resume.
